channel.title: Best Free Forums?
channel.description: Title says it all. I am fed up with terrible websites such as forumotion and webs. Although I am still to belligerent to purchase a domain since I only use websites very miniscule to begin with. Any suggestions?

item.title: Best Free Forums?
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

fuck forums; get a blog like moparscape

Read full topic

I am currently using imbahost and its really simple.

Read full topic

item.title: Best Free Forums?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:11, topic:516618”][quote author=nickb link=topic=634879.msg4284799#msg4284799 date=1366206330]

Will still never understand why anyone would use IPB over anything else.

Which one do you prefer? I never knew how something like smf would be better.
Could this be explained?
[/quote]
Comparing something like SMF and IPB is like comparing apples and oranges; both have their advantages over each other but at the end of the day I’d always choose SMF. SMF is a really great software and the fact that it’s free is a complete bonus, you can easily spend upwards of a thousand dollars on an IPB installation after mods and themes are purchased. On top of that, if you don’t have a pretty powerful webhost or dedi behind your site then IPB will be incredibly slow. At the end of the day, unless you have a fortune to put behind your forums IPB is a waste of time.[/quote]Was never much of a fan of IPB even though after purchasing a license for one last month I am starting to come around to it slowly. Even though as you did state after you get like 50 active users on it you better be using a dedi. That ajax sucks up stuff like mad crazy

Read full topic

Good software, very little support or modifications/themes etc.[/quote]

I only advertise fluxbb because a veteran of the rsc community is head dev.

item.title: Best Free Forums?
item.dc:creator: @RevengePK RevengePK
item.description:
@RevengePK wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:11, topic:516618”][quote author=nickb link=topic=634879.msg4284799#msg4284799 date=1366206330]

Will still never understand why anyone would use IPB over anything else.

Which one do you prefer? I never knew how something like smf would be better.
Could this be explained?
[/quote]
Comparing something like SMF and IPB is like comparing apples and oranges; both have their advantages over each other but at the end of the day I’d always choose SMF. SMF is a really great software and the fact that it’s free is a complete bonus, you can easily spend upwards of a thousand dollars on an IPB installation after mods and themes are purchased. On top of that, if you don’t have a pretty powerful webhost or dedi behind your site then IPB will be incredibly slow. At the end of the day, unless you have a fortune to put behind your forums IPB is a waste of time.[/quote]

Does this mean I suck because I love MyBB and IPB. :3

Read full topic

Good software, very little support or modifications/themes etc.
[/quote]DIY.[/quote]I usually write my own mods but I lack imagination when it comes to themes. That’s just me though, others without php knowledge or web design experience couldn’t do that and that’s why other softwares are more widely used.

item.title: Best Free Forums?
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

[quote=“Soulcist, post:12, topic:516618”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=634879.msg4284883#msg4284883 date=1366213225]
Comparing something like SMF and IPB is like comparing apples and oranges; both have their advantages over each other but at the end of the day I’d always choose SMF. SMF is a really great software and the fact that it’s free is a complete bonus, you can easily spend upwards of a thousand dollars on an IPB installation after mods and themes are purchased. On top of that, if you don’t have a pretty powerful webhost or dedi behind your site then IPB will be incredibly slow. At the end of the day, unless you have a fortune to put behind your forums IPB is a waste of time.
[/quote]
Finally, someone that understands the pain I had to endure.[/quote]

hehehehehehe, na it wasn’t that bad tho cmon

Read full topic

item.title: Best Free Forums?
item.dc:creator: @iCreatedHorror Ryan
item.description:
@iCreatedHorror wrote:

I’ve always been a fan of SMF and it does exactly what I would need out of a forum software, so what why would I shell out money for something like vBulletin or IPB.
I’m also not a huge fan of MyBB or phpBB (I’ve given them both a try, just not a fan of either).

Read full topic

item.title: Best Free Forums?
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

SMF and MyBB are both decent in my opinion. They’re both user friendly and have decent support.

Read full topic

item.title: Best Free Forums?
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Ruby:

Comparing something like SMF and IPB is like comparing apples and oranges; both have their advantages over each other but at the end of the day I’d always choose SMF. SMF is a really great software and the fact that it’s free is a complete bonus, you can easily spend upwards of a thousand dollars on an IPB installation after mods and themes are purchased. On top of that, if you don’t have a pretty powerful webhost or dedi behind your site then IPB will be incredibly slow. At the end of the day, unless you have a fortune to put behind your forums IPB is a waste of time.

Finally, someone that understands the pain I had to endure.

OT: SMF would have to be the best free software that I could think of. I doubt you would want to deal with Mybb and PHPBB.

Read full topic

SMF is a really great software and the fact that it’s free is a complete bonus, you can easily spend upwards of a thousand dollars on an IPB installation after mods and themes are purchased. On top of that, if you don’t have a pretty powerful webhost or dedi behind your site then IPB will be incredibly slow. At the end of the day, unless you have a fortune to put behind your forums IPB is a waste of time.
